reviewText:
I purchased this for a Christmas gift.  The description does not state that one of the two DVD's are rated for B & C rated DVD players only.
I am disappointed in the seller of these DVD's that are only rated for certain DVD players. I see that a new warning has been added to the item, after I purchased it.
It did not work on any of my bluray players..

This is a combo pack so you would think both would be able to be played in the same blu ray player.. Nope. ! One was compatible and one was not. No external markings describe that either had to return
You need to put on here it doesn't work in the US!

Warning: If you live in the States, these Blu-Rays may not play in your machine. The price is also insanely high. Unless you absolutely need a Region B/2 version, which per Amazon is for Europe, Greenland, French territories, Middle East, Africa, Australia and New Zealand, order the two separate discs instead. Here are links to Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief [Blu-ray] and also Percy Jackson: Sea of Monsters (Blu-ray/DVD + DigitalHD). Together, the list prices for those individual discs is still less than two-thirds of the price of this set and, more importantly, you'll actually be able to watch the movies!
Love, love, love this series! Thank you. Arrived in perfect condition.

We ordered this as a gift for our son, who loves this book series. We are unable to view the 1st DVD because it is in a different format than the 2nd DVD. The format of the 1st DVD will not play in either of our DVD players. Because it was purchased in advance, we are outside of the window for returning the item.  We are very disappointed.
No it wasn't anything like I wanted!!!
My nephew loved it. Amazing quality

DO NOT BUY!! Purchased this for my son and the Lightening Thief does NOT work. Of course he watched Sea of Monsters first and that worked fine. We went to watch it last night and it stated "will work in B and C regions only not A". I've never heard of this...was going to return it and now the window has closed. Will NEVER buy from this seller again!
If you want this, don't buy it because you can't watch The Lightning Thief. You can only watch The Sea Of Monsters. Look out for the blue PG button. It will say Irish Film Classification Office.
Not as good as the books, but that's to be expected! Good DVD though!
Couldn't play Percy Jackson 2 wrong region.
Bought for christmas first disc is set to only work in region b or c. Now I will have to go out and buy this first movie again , because review window closed prior to christmas.

when I received my vides one was ok and the other one was for area B and C. which would not play on my vcr. Trying to get this problem resolved has been a problem. I am still waiting for final resolution.
